__e: This is a photo of Ed Clark and my mother.
You told her that Ed Clark was killed.
I've told you before... Clark is my best friend, and that's all.
Just because you never got Clark doesn't mean you need to take it out on me.
Fine. Maybe Clark doesn't need me. Maybe I need him.
Clark doesn't have anything to do with this!
I put myself on the line and said there's no way Clark Kent would do that.
But I can tell that your heart is saying the opposite. And if I know one thing, it's that Clark Kent's heart is usually right.
And then something occurred to me, and I realized that Clark Kent would never take another man's life.
But Clark was all, "I'm going, who else wants to?"
- No, and then clark found his own thing.
Clark needs you as much as the world needs him.
And I'm sorry, Clark, but I can't do this if we can't tell my parents.
I don't know, clark, but we owe it to him to do something.
Well, neither can you anymore, Clark, if that's what you're thinking.
Clark, if you are up for it, I think we should keep the case. O-obvious...
Clark, if there's anything you know that we don't...
